Perceptor: What in the pit is that thing?

Chimera: It seems too big to be a pod. Do you think it's a beacon 
signal, or some other electronic device?

Perceptor: How should I know? You go check.

Dracon didn't quite like to be bossed around, so he decided to take 
the lead. He grabbed Perceptor by the front and pointed his laser arm 
in the critical parts.

Chimera: Listen, you underachieved lackey, I am of the same stock as 
Hydras, so you better not tell me what to do. I promise that you will 
regret anything that you might want to do against me. Now you 
transform and you go check, got it.

Perceptor was rightly scared and only managed to agree quickly before 
walking forward, trying to see what was going on...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> The two preds Sensors picks up an object comming from the sky. It 
is small bout 5 meters in length It seems to let off an energy Signal

Maximals Base.
